package.name: jimmycpp
package.description: This package is a library to bridge the hardware and the ROS code. For example when a diff_drive controller sends a radian per sec command for wheel velocity, this package will convert this value into a command the stepper driver understands and send the electrical signals need to achieve the desired velocity. If you seen any issues please report it to the maintainer! I appriciate feedback.
package.author: MO
